posts.post_title: WTB: 1907 Dietsche Postcard Ty Cobb Batting
posts.post_content: Let me know what you have.

There should be one coming up in LOTG, PSA 2, you've seen it before.

GL on the search.

GL on the search.[/QUOTE]

Thanks Steven. I will definitely keep an eye out for it.
Kevin, you posted about two weeks too late - Memory Lane will have a PSA 2.5 in its next auction....
Looks like LOTG will have a PSA 2 in their next auction.  Lot 34
